dataSubsets.sql: ALTER TABLE dukes_2023 ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS uuid uuid DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(); ALTER TABLE dukes_2023 ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS iri varchar DEFAULT 'irigoeshere'; UPDATE dukes_2023 SET iri = 'https://theworldavatar.io/demos/uk-power-system/PowerPlant/' || uuid;

virtualTable.name: dukes_2023_geo
virtualTable.sql:
SELECT wkb_geometry, 'http://UKBASEWORLD-blazegraph:8080/blazegraph/namespace/dukes_2023/sparql' as endpoint, "Site Name" as name, 'Generation type: ' || "Site Type" || '
Installed Capacity: ' || "Installed Capacity (MW)" || ' [MW]' as desc, "Site Technology" as technology, "Country" as country, "Site Type" as type, "Primary Fuel" as primary_fuel, "Installed Capacity (MW)" as capacity, iri FROM dukes_2023
